# MISC::UNLOAD_CLOUD_HAT

## Summary
Forces a cloud hat to unload, reguardless of the current cloud settings

## Parameters
* **STRING** cloudHatName: Force a loading of the named cloud hat
* **FLOAT** transitionTime = 0: Amount of time to fade out the cloudhat, default is 0 seconds.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
this is to help with tralers, etc. please don't use this in general
